articles.title: ‘Nightmare trying to find a place’: New campaign seeks to end pet discrimination in Mass. rentals
articles.description:
The MSPCA launched a new campaign called Action for Pet-Inclusive Housing, which includes advocacy for two bills now under consideration by the Massachusetts Legislature.

The post ‘Nightmare trying to find a place’: New campaign seeks to end pet discrimination in Mass. rentals appeared first on Boston.com.
